text:
Fall 3

Machine Learning- Dr Race
1- Dimen. Reduction & Curse of Dimen.
2- Clustering
3- Neural Nets
4- Random Forests & Gradient Boosting
5- Regularized Reg Ridge & LASSO
6- Support Vector Machines & Kernals

Assignments:
Only have a Kaggle Project

Survival Analysis- Dr Simmons
11/1 Survival Curves/Hazard I
11/3 Survival Curves/Hazard II
11/7 Accelerated Failure Time Model I
11/9 Accelerated Failure Time Model II
11/11 Cox Regression Model I
11/15 Cox Regression Model II
11/17 or 18: Competing Risks I
11/22: Competing Risks II/Review

Assignments:
Quiz due Tues Nov 8
HW1 (Due 11/11)
HW2 (Due 11/22)
Final Test nov 30th or Dec 1 (We choose)

Marketing Analytics- Dr. D
11/1: Introduction to Segmentation
11/2: Hierarchical Segmentation I
11/7: Hierarchical Segmentation II
11/9: Non-Hierarchical Segmentation
11/11: Targeting/Scoring Models I
11/14: Targeting/Scoring Models II
11/18: Dimen. Reduction- PCA, FA, VC
11/22: Dimen. Reduction- PLS

Assignments: 
1 (Due Nov 11)
2 (Due Nov 18)
3 (Due Nov 25)
Quiz (opens Dec 2)
Final Project (Due Nov 28? Slides due 30th)

Simulation & Risk- Dr L
11/1 Main Concepts of Simulation I
11/3 Main Concepts of Simulation II
11/7 Theory & Model Assessment
11/9 Intro to Risk Management
11/11 Key Risk Measures
11/15 Estimation & CI's for VaR & ES I
11/16 Estimation & CI's for VaR & ES II
11/22 Recent Developments

Assignments:
HW 1 (Due Nov 14)
HW 2 (Due Nov 18)
HW 3 (Due Nov 22)
Final Project (Due Nov 28)
